channel.title: [PI] Torva Platebody - need help please
channel.description:
I just added the torva platebody and helmet, but I still need some help quick.
Note: I'm fairly new to this.
I added the torva, like I said, and now I need to get it in the right positions, instead of the weapons spot. What file do I go to to add the code for this?
Also, the platebody is still glitchy, there are see thru spots so to speak, how could I fix this?
Thanks.

item.title: [PI] Torva Platebody - need help please
item.dc:creator: @Im_Mad_1337 Im_Mad_1337
item.description:
@Im_Mad_1337 wrote:

Just go to \src\server\model\items, open item.java and I’m sure it’s self explanatory from there Good luck.

Read full topic
